title: volume-label-probability
description:
Find frequency of volume labels.

This command outputs a set of soft ROIs, one for each label in the input, where the value is how many of the input maps had that label at that voxel, divided by the number of input maps.

label_maps.title: label_maps
label_maps.description: volume label file containing individual label maps from many subjects

probability_out.title: probability_out
probability_out.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each voxel

opt_exclude_unlabeled.title: opt_exclude_unlabeled
opt_exclude_unlabeled.description: don't make a probability map of the unlabeled key
